author: Sarah Roberts
comment: Would love to use this - but says it's downloaded but it's no where to be found on phone or gear! Turned both items off and on and everything else I can think of. Got it 24 hours ago! Not there. Paid money

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hello Sarah,

Sounds like you have a Gear watch which is not Android Wear and therefore not supported. Send me an email so I can work on a refund for you.

Merry Christmas!
Shameron Studios

author: paul bishop
comment: Can't open on Samsung s4

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hello Paul,

This is an Android Wear watch face and does not run on phones. Please open the play store on your Android Wear watch and download it there.

Merry Christmas!
Shameron Studios

comment: great until the season was over
It is good

author: Sebastian Ebata
comment: Moto 360 2gen. I download the app but I doesn't show up anywhere. I'm a doing something wrong?

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hello Sebastian,
Android Wear Watch Faces sometimes do not appear for up to 30 minutes as it loads from your phone to your watch. Sometimes, resyncing your device in the Android Wear app settings will speed up this process. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Merry Christmas!
Shameron Studios

title: Best Christmas watch face out there

comment: Christmas Countdown Watch Face is pretty much THE best christmas-themed watch-face I have found thus far - it looks great, there's plenty of customization options and it works well. When I use my Sony SmartWatch 3 Steel this holiday season, this will be the watch-face I'll have active - though I do wish there was a version for Pebble/Pebble Time products, as I use my Pebble most of the time...
title: Looks incredible - but needs a Pebble/Pebble Time version.

comment: Say something better than days to Christmas 0 on the day!! But otherwise good design!

comment: How r u supposed to get it?

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hello,
This watch face is for Android Wear devices only.
Android Wear Watch Faces sometimes do not appear for up to 30 minutes as it loads from your phone to your watch. Sometimes, resyncing your device in the Android Wear app settings will speed up this process. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Merry Christmas!
Shameron Studios

author: Susan Inman
comment: How  do u move it from phone to gear s?!

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Susan,

Unfortunately, the Gear S runs on the "Tizan" operating system which is not compatible with Android Wear apps. 

Sorry for the inconvenience. Merry Christmas!
Shameron Studios
